title: Looking For A Rank Team Also Plays In Tournaments!
body:
Hi i am looking for a serious rank team, wanting to go to tournaments and play competitive!

Positions: Main Support, i am the best support you'll ever will get! Also i will try play according to your style since i can play all support well pick me a champion pool and ill try improve on it! Also I am also good at jungling and fill in any lanes pretty well.

Last season --> Plat IV
Currently --> Gold 1 (trying climb up the ladder)
Free most afternoons and weekends --> Lives in Sydney
Non Toxic and willing to learn
Competitive but hates solo Q cause most my games ends up 4v5
Have Skype, curse,ts and can download any other programs!

Interested in recruiting me add me on OCE --> Thuy
thanks for looking
